content.title: Exciting News: eMotion Ultra Now Doubles as a BLE Hub!
content.creator:
LinknLink Pty Ltd
January 23, 2025
content.content:
Say Goodbye to Extra Hubs – Connect Your BLE Sensors Directly!
We’re thrilled to share some fantastic news: the eMotion Ultra will be equipped with a powerful BLE hub feature! With this upgrade, there’s no need for an extra BLE hub – you can connect up to 16 BLE sensors directly to your eMotion Ultra.
What can you connect?
BLE Temperature and Humidity Sensor (with screen display) from LinknLink
BLE Contact Sensor from LinknLink
Enjoy a maximum BLE range of 30 meters (98 feet), making it easier than ever to monitor your space with seamless connectivity.
To thank for the support from our fans, we won't increase the price for the added great feature but it may save you another $20 for a hub.
This is just the beginning of our commitment to innovation and enhancing your smart home experience.
Make your pledge now and choose the accessories that best suit your needs!
Thank you for being part of the LinknLink journey. Stay tuned for more exciting updates!
Best Regards
LinknLink

comments.text: Is the BLE hub limited to 2 devices? Could I connect other, non-LinknLink BLE devices?

Hi Martin, The eMotion Ultra can connect to a maximum of 30 BLE devices, but these devices must be from LinknLink. Unfortunately, BLE does not currently have a unified smart home standard, so it’s not a matter of us not wanting to ensure compatibility—it’s simply a limitation that no one can overcome at this time. Thanks

content.title: Technology Upgrade Announcement: eMotion Ultra Adopts 2nd-Gen mmWave Radar Module
content.creator:
LinknLink Pty Ltd
January 23, 2025
content.content:
Dear Pledgers and Smart Home Enthusiasts,
Over the past few months, our team has made comprehensive improvements, refining everything from the antenna’s physical design to the signal processing architecture. Today, we are excited to introduce the eMotion Ultra will be powered by the 2nd-Gen 60GHz mmWave radar module, expertly designed by the LinknLink team!
The upgrade from our 1st-Gen 60GHz mmWave Radar technology focuses on optimizing antenna design and enhancing transmission efficiency.
Technical Improvements:
Antenna Optimization: The new 2T2R antenna design reduces signal scattering, suppresses multipath interference, and improves weak signal detection at long distances. It maintains a ±60° beam angle, with better sensitivity at the edges.
Increased Power Efficiency: The effective radiated power (ERP) is increased by 20%, while maintaining 12dBm transmission power. A stable power supply ensures consistent performance even in fluctuating conditions.
Co-optimized Algorithms and Hardware: Upgraded signal processing algorithms accurately identify static and micro-motion targets, while dynamic interference shielding filters out fixed interferences. The low-power mode reduces consumption to 2.5mA during idle times.
Test Results: Internal tests show a 7-meter detection range with 98% accuracy for static targets, outperforming the first-gen model in complex environments.
Commitment: eMotion Ultra is a hardware upgrade and a step towards smarter, seamless interaction. We’ll continue to improve the product with future OTA updates. Thank you for your support - eMotion Ultra is nearing mass production, promising an enhanced smart experience.
Best Regards
LinknLink Team
